images.description: SDSS image of region near spiral galaxy NGC 772, also showing its companion NGC 770, which are collectively known as Arp 78
SDSS image of spiral galaxy NGC 772 and its companion NGC 770, which are collectively known as Arp 78, digitally enhanced to show fainter features
NOAO image of spiral galaxy NGC 772 and NGC 770, collectively known as Arp 78, overlaid on an SDSS background to fill in missing areas
HST image of the central portion of spiral galaxy NGC 772
